mapper.update: update tdl set creation_time = #{creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, starting_time = #{startingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ending_time = #{endingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, priority = #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, details = #{details,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, creation_time, starting_time, ending_time, priority, details from tdl
